name: Hide attributes for contract Renewal
action:
<*DISALLOWATTRIBUTES(ATTCON_09_close,ATTCON_09_open,ATTCON_10_close,ATTCON_10_open,HDP Additional Concurrent user,HDP Safety Manager,HDP TPS Only,HDP_Additiona_MSID,HDP_Additiona_MSID,HDP_Additional_Appliance,HDP_Additional_MSID_Name,HDP_Base_Msid,HDP_Base_Msid,HDP_Exprion_TPSPlus_EXP,HDP_MSID_Name,HDP_Swap_MSID,HDP_System_additional_Size,HDP_System_additional_Size,HDP_System_additional_Size,HDP_System_Size,HDP_System_Size,HDP_System_Size,HDPBase Package,HDPBase Package,HDPBase Package,Header_09_close,Header_09_open,Header_10_close,Header_10_open)*>
<*CTX ( Container(SC_MSID_Container).Column(Base MSID).SetPermission(Hidden) )*><*CTX ( Container(SC_MSID_Container).Column(Additional MSID).SetPermission(Hidden) )*>
